# Edward Armon Sieker

Edward Armon Sieker Jr. ( â€“ 1901), sometimes styled Ed A. Sieker in print, was an American lawman and a Texas Ranger. In his time with the Rangers, he was involved in a number of gunfights with Native Americans and outlaws. His three brothers, including Lamartine Pemberton Sieker, were also Texas Rangers.
